content:
What a wonderful idea! Celebrating your anniversary at the bride's family's B&B will surely make it a memorable and special occasion. July 1st is a great time to plan a romantic getaway, especially if the B&B is surrounded by beautiful mountains or scenic views.

When you reach out to the bride's family, be sure to mention your anniversary and ask about any special packages or promotions they might be offering during that time. They might have a romantic getaway package or a discount for couples celebrating a special occasion.

Also, don't forget to ask about any fun activities or events happening in the area around July 1st. You might be able to plan a fun outdoor adventure, like hiking or kayaking, or attend a local festival or concert to make your anniversary celebration even more special.

Since you have a personal connection with the bride's family, they might be willing to go the extra mile to make your anniversary celebration truly unforgettable. Don't hesitate to ask about any special requests or surprises you might want to plan, like a private dinner or a special activity.

I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time celebrating your anniversary at the B&B, and I'm excited for you!
